raw_infobox.name: Stephen Curry
raw_infobox.alt: Curry during a visit to the White House in 2023
raw_infobox.caption: Curry at the White House in 2023
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 4× List of NBA champions (2015 NBA Finals, 2017 NBA Finals, 2018 NBA Finals, 2022 NBA Finals)
* NBA Finals Most Valuable Player (2022 NBA Finals)
* 2× NBA Most Valuable Player (2014, 2015)
* 11× List of NBA All-Stars (2014–2019, 2021–2025)
*  2× NBA All-Star Game Kobe Bryant Most Valuable Player (2022, 2025)
* 4× All-NBA Team (2014, 2015, 2018, 2020)
* 5× All-NBA Team (2013, 2016, 2021, 2022, 2024)
* 2× All-NBA Team (2017, 2023)
* NBA All-Rookie Team (2009)
* 2× Three-Point Contest champion (2015, 2021)
* 2× List of NBA annual scoring leaders (2015, 2020)
* List of NBA annual steals leaders (2015)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* Associated Press Athlete of the Year (2015)
* 2× Sports Illustrated Sportsperson of the Year (2018,{{efn|As part of the Golden State Warriors.}} 2022)
* USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year (2024)
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (2009 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Consensus second-team All-American (2008 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* List of NCAA Division I men's basketball season scoring leaders (2009)
* 2× Southern Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (2008, 2009)
* 3× First-team All-Southern Conference (2007–2009)
* No. 30 Davidson Wildcats men's basketball#Retired numbers
